## fable: Time Series Forecasting Models

**What is this?**

**Fable** provides a collection of time series forecasting models that
integrate with the **tidyverse** framework, making model evaluation and
visualization straightforward.

1.  Link to package: <https://github.com/tidyverts/fable>
